overview:
One of the original members of the Wpromote Team, Michael is responsible for the management of all Agency Services clients at Wpromote and oversees the PPC, Media Buying, SEO, Social Media, and Web Development departments at Wpromote. With extensive online marketing and PPC management experience, Michael also executes strategy for Wpromote’s largest clients as well as directly manages a select portfolio of strategic accounts.

Michael is considered Wpromote’s foremost expert not only on paid search, but also on single malt Scotch and Paleontology. There isn’t a question about whisky or dinosaurs that he can’t answer, which is a great comfort to the other employees. Prior to his time at Wpromote, Michael’s chief accomplishment was his fifth grade victory in a Marc Summers-hosted game show. Michael graduated cum laude from Dartmouth College with a B.A. in Government and Spanish.
